title: General Rahmini's Dilemna
description: A political thriller about one of Saddam Hussein's top military officers, wanted as a war criminal, who is forced by ISIS to head a suicide mission to the United States. To elude both ISIS and American security, he disguises himself as an Episcopal priest. In a small Montana town circumstances oblige him to actually serve and live as a priest, transforming him into a different person.
author: Benson Grayson
